paper_abstract: We present a new algorithm for computing the volume of a convex body in R-n. The main ingredients of the algorithm are (i) a "morphing" technique that can be viewed as a variant of simulated annealing and (ii) a new rounding algorithm to put a convex body in near-isotropic position. The complexity is O*(n(4)), improving on the previous best algorithm by a factor of n. (c) 2005 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Simulated annealing in convex bodies and an O*(n(4)) volume algorithm
